full_summary:
```markdown
# Category 6 Furniture Tender Announcement
--------------------------------------------------------

## Tender Details

| Parameter | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Tender Reference Number  | cb-7895-29783499 |
| Solicitation Number    | ISED 206662   |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-09-11T14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date   | 2023-09-01    |
| Expected Contract End Date     | 2024-03-31    |

## Procurement Information

* Tender Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Purchasing Category: Goods
* Goods and Services Identified by:
	+ UNSPSC: 56111500 (Workstations and Office Packages)
	+ Description: Workstations and office packages
* Procurement Agreement: No Special Agreements or Arrangements

## Tender Description
The requirement includes the following category (ies) of work: Category 6 – Support Space – Collaborative Furniture.

## Notice and Attachment

The Government of Canada has posted this notice on its tendering website. To access the tender documents, please visit the website at [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). The following attachments are posted with the notice:
+ [ISED 206662 RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7895/ised206662_rfb_en_cat6.pdf) (English)
+ [Addendum 2 – Question](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7895/addendum-2---question.pdf) 
+ [PDP1-23 GCWP Category 6](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7895/pdp1-23_gcwp_cat6.pdf)
+ [ISED 206662 RFP QA 001](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7895/ised206662---rfp---qa-001_eng.pdf) (English)

# Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact John Villeneuve at (343) 571-6760 or john.villeneuve@ised-isde.gc.ca.
```
